issues.message: Correct one of the identical sub-expressions on both sides of operator "<=".

Correct one of the identical sub-expressions on both sides of operator ">".
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "Command failed rc=%d, out=%s, err=%s" 11 times.
Correct one of the identical sub-expressions on both sides of operator "==".
Add a nested comment explaining why this method is empty, or complete the implementation.
Remove 1 unexpected arguments; 'warn' expects 1 positional arguments.
Add a nested comment explaining why this method is empty, or complete the implementation.
err_to_raise is used before it is defined. Move the definition before.
